page.title: 07...RECREATION
page.content: There are two categories of activity:- {1}Home Based {2}Those Needing Special Facilities.{1}The main home activity is creative craft work. Collecting things like stamps,coins,rubbers etc. came next followed by listening to music. Musical tastes in order of popularity were:- 1.Popular 2.Classical 3.Country and Western 4.Ethnic Folk Music. Each household averages 7hrs. TV./VCR. and 3-4hrs. Radio per day. Reading is very popular in the 5-11 and 23-50 age ranges. Newspapers are widely read followed by library books and comics/ magazines. {2}Most kinds of sport were popular especially swimming and football. Next came darts, snooker and fishing. Children play outside rather than in organised clubs. They save or spend pocket money on sweets etc. During 1984 only 50% of families had a holiday away
